sentences.sentence: With monetary mayhem now retreating into memory, European countries can breathe a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.translation: 随着金融混乱已成往事，欧洲国家全都可以松口气了。

sentences.sentence: The report found that although some king penguins may be able to relocate to new breeding grounds closer to their retreating food source, suitable new habitats would be scarce.
sentences.translation: 该报告发现，尽管一些帝企鹅可能能够迁移到离它们日益减少的食物来源更近的新繁殖地，但合适的新栖息地将会变得稀缺。
